Loss Threshold: ≤ 2% of received quantity

Disposition of Lost Material: Logged in waste register WR-APR-2025-01
Remarks
• All materials reconciled within acceptable limits
• No unexplained losses or discrepancies
• Returned quantities labeled and stored per SOP-MAT-204
• RM-PHOS-003 label issue resolved prior to use
• QA verified reconciliation against batch record and inventory ledger
